participants.name: Blake Ludera
participants.url: Went to St. Charles East High School

messages.message: hey, just wanted to shoot you a quick message...we met up at UK Thursdays last week. Get that demo cranked out asap!

Brian
Hey thanks! I just saw this for some reason. I have a lot of work to do, but we will catch you at UK Thursdays in the coming weeks.
Sounds good! We've got Total Science & MC Tali coming up this week, then on 10/20 we're bringing Mt. Eden. See ya soon-
hey, just wanted to touch base and see if you ever got a demo together.

Brian
oh, not yet.  Been busy with other projects.
ok, no prob. Make sure you hit me up when you do.

Brian
will do

Brian
Hey, how was last night?

insanity.
literally, from the time I woke up, 'til about 6am.

Brian
oh my.  are you involved with Crush also?
I definitely won't miss that.
nope, I'm not involved in any Relentless Beats events.

Brian
Oh right, maybe I will miss it.  I went to Neon and it sucked awful.

haha
yeah, I dunno, their electro house shows are usually pretty on point, but very Scottsdale-esque.
However when they throw dubstep or bass music events, they tend to miss the mark.

Brian
Check this out: http://www.instructables.com/id/Led-Cube-8x8x8/#step1
I am building one.
that's dope, kind of reminds me of the one they have at Mint

Brian
Yeah, exactly.  Except ours will have visuals based on sound rather than pre-programmed.
We are adding microphones to it.
I'll probably bring it around when its done.

ironically, the bar is actually having something similar installed from the rafters...
lemme see if I can find the vid real quick

Brian
Haha, neat.  We could do it cheaper.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDJLmZLmCfc&feature=related
something kinda like that.
shits dope though, I love LED lighting installation type stuff.

Brian
I love going quantum: www.youtube.com/watch?v=pV8SjNTZGJ4&list=UU5nJj-L4swL90huglMhKgOg&index=1&feature=plcp
Ohhh, watched your video, I totally had that idea, except using those same types of tubes around entrances to rooms
Like bead curtains.
crazy, there is so much good music all across the internet, I used to spend hours every day scouring for it, now it's beyond impossible to keep up, but this is dope. Thanks for the link.
